29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

151160.name: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
151160.desc: Headwear of the Guardian Shadows. Can be used for the Ascension of Lightning characters.
151160.lore:
Accessory left behind by the shadow of a past Guardian, telling tales of the city of Everwinter.

"Svetlana the Iron Fist — her wrath as terrifying as thunder and her retribution as swift as lightning."

270195.name: Guardian's Lament
270195.lore:
Together with this visor, the twisted wish of a Guardian also lies broken.
She had wanted to find a way out for her people to escape the Everwinter, but ended up becoming a puppet of a consciousness beyond her.

"Supreme Guardian, the title passed down to generations of Belobog's rulers, the one who looked after all the people — It never occurred to anyone that the Guardians themselves also long for care and protection."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549407.name: Silvermane Badge
549407.desc: Pin badge worn by soldiers of the Silvermane Guards. Crude material used for enhancement.
549407.lore:
It is full of scratches from the erosion of wind and snow.

"In ancient times, there was only one way Silvermane Guards could retire: death."

633348.name: Silvermane Insignia
633348.desc: Military rank insignia worn by captains of the Silvermane Guard. Normal material used for enhancement.
633348.lore:
Maybe it's a proof of heroics that you can brag about to your family. Maybe it's a lucky charm that protects you from a bullet.

"Times have changed."
comeFrom: Everwinter Shadewalker and Incineration Shadewalker at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Silvermane Guards and vagrants at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

635675.name: Key of Inspiration
635675.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the Meditative Scholars. Used to level up Traces slightly for Erudition characters.
635675.lore:
It can unlock inspirations hidden deep within the conscience.
To take hold of the key is to grasp at the darting embers of thought that lead to the forward path.

"Eureka!"

717289.name: Silvermane Medal
717289.desc: Medal of honor worn by soldiers of the Silvermane Guards with gallant and meritorious service. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717289.lore:
A proof of honor awarded to those that fought against Fragmentum creatures, Underworlders, and sudden disasters.
It is not usually pinned onto the recipient's chest, but rather placed onto his coffin.

"Remember, young Gepard. It is not a toy: it is the destiny and blood of the Landau family."
comeFrom: Everwinter Shadewalker and Incineration Shadewalker at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Silvermane Guards and vagrants at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

836261.name: Key of Wisdom
836261.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the greatest prodigies of the cosmos. Used to level up Traces significantly for Erudition characters.
836261.lore:
This is the proof of invitation to the halls of the Nous Temple.
Finding the door of which this key opens is a far more arduous task than obtaining the key itself. Those who pass through the doors will immediately realize the impossibility of returning to this side.

"The Erudition does not have answers to the universe, but it will teach you how to ask the right questions."

920202.name: Key of Knowledge
920202.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the sages of the worlds. Used to level up Traces moderately for Erudition characters.
920202.lore:
It can unlock the mysteries binding the truth of the world and grants knowledge beyond the understanding of humans.
No matter how the wielder attempts to display their possession of the key, no one but themselves can see its form. Some people believe that to be a gift from the heavens, while others think it's a sign of mental disorder.

"I had a dream of molecules coiling up into a loop like a snake biting its own tail. I woke up realizing that this is the answer I've been looking for all along!"

ranks.name: Echo Chamber
ranks.descHash: Basic ATK deals Lightning DMG equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of the Basic ATK's DMG to a random enemy adjacent to the target of the Basic ATK.

ranks.name: Encore!
ranks.descHash: Every time Serval's Talent is triggered to deal Additional DMG, she regenerates <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Energy.

ranks.name: Listen, the Heartbeat of the Gears
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Make Some Noise!
ranks.descHash: Ultimate has a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> base chance to apply Shock to any enemies not currently Shocked. This Shock has the same effects as the one applied by Skill.

ranks.name: Belobog's Loudest Roar!
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: This Song Rocks to Heaven!
ranks.descHash: Serval deals <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> more DMG to Shocked enemies.

skills.descHash: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap

skills.descHash:
Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a #3[i]% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked for #4[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to #5[i]% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
skills.name: Lightning Flash

skills.descHash: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by #2[i] turn(s).
skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever

skills.descHash: After Serval attacks, deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.
skills.name: Galvanic Chords

skills.descHash: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to #4[i]% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a #1[i]% base chance for all enemies to become Shocked for #3[i] turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to #2[i]% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
skills.name: Good Night, Belobog

embedBonusSkill.descHash: Skill has a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> increased base chance to Shock enemies.
embedBonusSkill.name: Rock 'n' Roll

embedBonusSkill.descHash: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Energy.
embedBonusSkill.name: String Vibration

embedBonusSkill.descHash: Upon defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).
embedBonusSkill.name: Mania

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: Hi Trailblazer, the name's Serval Landau, I'm a Belobog mechanic. Of course, that's really just what I do on the side — rock 'n' roll is my main occupation.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Huh? You start work this early?

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Signing off now! Time to get some songwriting going~

voiceItems.title: About Self: Landau
voiceItems.text: If we Landaus have one thing in common, it's that we're all stubborn in our own way.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Working as a Mechanic
voiceItems.text: If you wanna make sure you don't burn yourself out or stifle your creativity, then don't push yourself too hard at work~

voiceItems.title: Chat: Band
voiceItems.text: Pela's got a lot on her plate — plus she also does volunteer work on the weekends sometimes. That's why we usually schedule Mechanical Fever's rehearsals at night.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: Since I do rock 'n' roll full-time, I'd say my hobby is... work? What's wrong with that?

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: I always get people asking me how my workshop makes money when it's not trading. Use your brain! It doesn't!

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: Mechanics, research, and music are all things I'm pretty good at, wouldn't you say? But I guess making money's not on the list...

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: When Bronya becomes the supreme guardian, do you reckon she'll let me perform at Golden Theater? I'll re-arrange that "Supreme Guardian" stage show and make it a rock 'n' roll musical!

voiceItems.title: About Gepard
voiceItems.text: If he paid more attention to his affairs, it'd save me a lot of headaches... I guess I do create a few headaches for him too... Maybe we're even.

voiceItems.title: About Pela
voiceItems.text: She's a flower-growing drummer and a great report writer. Name a more reliable girl. I'll wait.

voiceItems.title: About Bronya
voiceItems.text: Bronya's a good kid — you can tell she learned a lot from Cocolia. *sigh* It's been a while since we saw each other. I miss her.

voiceItems.title: About Cocolia
voiceItems.text: The Cocolia I knew would sit on the roof and listen to my songs, but... not the supreme guardian.

voiceItems.title: About Sampo
voiceItems.text: Hah, that guy. One of these days he's gonna get busted by my brother.

voiceItems.title: About Lynx
voiceItems.text: Lynxy? ...She's more like me. Ah, don't tell my brother that, he hates hearing it.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Time for the main event.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: Here to crash the party?

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Pretty good crowd today.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: This song's just for you~

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: The audience is waiting!

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: Let's rock!

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Keep up with my tempo!

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Turn up the volume!

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: That's it?

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: Not bad.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Ready to lose yourself?

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Fight it or rock with it... my music conquers all!

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: The show... must go on...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: Time for an encore~

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Ah~ Ready to jam~

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Can't stop the rock!

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: The best is yet to come!

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Wow, good stuff.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving
voiceItems.text: I'm getting the hang of this.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Huh, these targets will make for good practice~

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: There's inspiration in every glance and every breeze.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
The free and rebellious eldest daughter of the Landau family. Once a close friend of Cocolia's, she is now a mechanic purely because she likes this job.
In the Everwinter-stricken Belobog, she opened a workshop called "Neverwinter" that puts business on hold from time to time for outdoor rock 'n' roll performances.
And should anyone ask her about the workshop's profits... "This is just a hobby, dear. I'm not short on money."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
This is the most talented mechanic in all of Belobog and rock star. Did we mention she's also the sister of Captain Gepard Landau of the Silvermane Guards?

"Stop. Stop that. Keep the first part, and leave out the second part."
"I'd like you not to gloss over my identity like that... I, Serval Landau, am no one's accessory."

"...Oh, there's nothing else afterward? Okay. Let me chip in then: If something's broken, drop into the Neverwinter Workshop in the Administrative District to see me, any time."
"What's that, you wanna hear some rock'n'roll? Well, that's even better — drop into our Neverwinter Workshop in the Administrative District to rock this city — with Mechanical Fever!"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
Serval Landau owns a piece of land in the heart of Belobog's Administrative District — the Neverwinter Workshop — where she in theory makes a living from her mechanical repairs.

But to be more precise, almost all of this genius mechanic's time is spent repairing and making improvements to various musical instruments...

"Tsk, don't pay any attention to that magazine! I'm a reputable business owner..."
"From geomarrow radiators to car engines — or even a Silvermane automaton — it's no trouble at all. As well as maintenance and renovations of ordinary appliances, I also provide a modding service."
"Like fitting an external drill bit to a snowplow, or a ballistic trajectory calculator to a toaster... That kinda stuff."

"Ah? You want to know how's business going? Hey, don't ask so many questions — you know I like to fool around with music in my spare time."
"Anyway, I never planned on making a fortune... Life's too short. Why not plunge yourself into your hobbies?"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
Serval was able to rekindle her passion for music after cutting off all connections with her family.

This led to her prestigious workshop becoming a base for her to rock out — despite suffering constant complaints, this cutting-edge art style from before the Eternal Freeze is still sought out by hordes of hipster kids...

"Oh, I give up! Can you trashy tabloids and your so-called "music critics" focus on what's important, please? 'Suffering constant complaints'... 'hipster kids'... My fans and I would dispute that!"
"But I suppose it's true that Mechanical Fever is popular with youths — at that age, kids are either full of enthusiasm or are underappreciated..."
"No matter what your mood is, you always have to vent sometimes. And rocking out with me just so happens to be the best way of doing that!"

"...Just like what I did back in the day."
"Ahh, it's fine! Don't worry. I was just suddenly reminiscing about the past..."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
In days gone by, everyone knew that Serval Landau was the smartest out of all the Silvermane Guards — 80% of the rumors about the talented elder daughter of the Landaus are based around this fact.

However those rumors were almost instantly replaced by a new piece of gossip a few years ago. Why was she, who had always been close with the Supreme Guardian, being fired from the armed forces with no prior warning? Does Serval hold a grudge about it? Everyone has their own theory.

"The answer to the first question is simple: 'No comment.' This is the Silvermane Guards's top secret. I hope you understand."
"And as for the second question..."

"I... I don't give two hoots. Think about it. Is there anything better than living out a justifiably leisurely life? I prefer to say that woman helped me out — I really owe her a debt!"
"In this world, it's better to enjoy the present moment... No, who am I kidding."

"If our ends are already doomed, there will be no such thing as true joy."

name: Serval
descHash: A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects. As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's. She loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.
